items.description: Decoder VDL2 messages using dumpvdl2 and an SDR

items.name: decoder-vdl-vdlm2dec
items.description: Decoder VDL2 messages using vdlm2dec and an SDR

items.name: Planefence
items.summary: Detect aircraft within a boundary around your receiver and get alerted.
items.description: Planefence will create a log of aircraft heard by your Feeder Station that are within a "fence", that is, less than a certain distance and lower than a certain altitude from your station. This log is displayed on a website and is also made available in daily CSV files. Furthermore, Planefence can send a Tweet for every plane in the fence, and (coming soon!) will be able to collect noise figures to see how loud the aircraft are that fly above your Feeder Station.

items.name: ACARS Hub
items.summary: Alternative web interface to view realtime ACARS/VDL messages heard by your station.
items.description: Docker container to view ACARS messages. It makes extensive use of the airframes work to make the messages more 'human-readable' as well as provide more detail for each of the messages.
